column5: Super nice boat there, enjoy!
I am so jealous. Excellent looking boat and I like the stand up top.
I'm jealous. That's going to be awful comfy when the bad weather hits.
This makes me want to trade in my tiller...  Beautiful machine, time to get it slimed up

Very nice  bought a 18' aluminum fishing boat 30 years ago, today I would still say it was the best choice. Recognizing the neighbourhood, I am a little shocked you don't have it outfitted as a great lakes troller, being 5 minutes from a lauch ramp. Different stokes for different folks
Welcome to the Smokercraft family! I bought my ProMag ( 162) new in 98. The fit and finish still looks great today. Thats one heck of a rig.

Hi all, got the new boat today...she sure is pretty.  Smokercraft Promag 182.  Went with the Suzuki 140hp, Terrova with i-pilot and US2 and a 587ci for the front and a 597ci for the console.  Thanks to everyone who offered advice over the past few years while I planned this out!  I definitely got a lot of helpful information!
Oh man,  that is one really sweet ride.   You'll enjoy that one
That's sure one nice boat.Should really move along. can't wait to hear about the test run.
Sweet ride.
Beauty ride  all weather fishin pleasure
Congratulations, that is one great looking boat and your first trip is going to be super sweet ! Soooo jealous.
Very Nice
That Suzuki is pretty sleek. Pairs up with the 182 excellently.
Beautiful machine!
Great lookin ride!  Ya gone done made me jealous
Awesome boat!  You must be so pumped to get out and christen it!
very nice boat.  I hope you have years of great memories catching lots of fish on that boat.  Peace
Saweet ride. Git 'er slimed
O' you Sneak e pete , and you bought it at my favorite marina too ! Pretty hard to beat those guys .
I must say that I believe in promoting good business....Marsh's Marina treated me right from the first conversation.  Not a bad thing to say sbout them... they were awesome.
Very Nice!
Sweet new ride!! Enjoy it!

Great looking boat and with that full windshield and stand-up top you'll be more than comfortable when the weather turns nasty.  Never had any experience with the Suzuki's myself but I've heard alot of good reviews on them.
Sweet ride!
Very nice ride enjoy!  Now slime it and show us fish pics.
WoW nice rig!  Buy in the US or Canada?
man! that is one sweet look'n rig!..It shoud fly with a 140  Congradulations!!!
SWEET looking ride. My next boat will most likely be along those lines. Now get out there and ENJOY!!
